com.wm.pkg.sap.idoc
Class IDOCControl

java.lang.Object
  com.wm.pkg.sap.idoc.IDOCControl
Deprecated. As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the webMethods IDoc Java API. 

public class IDOCControl
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an IDoc control segment. It allows to create new segments, put a value to a certain field or to retrieve a value from a segment.

See Also:
IDOC

Constructor Detail

IDOCControl

public IDOCControl(com.wm.util.Values control)
Deprecated. As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the webMethods IDoc Java API.

Constructs an IDOCControl object from an existing Values object representing the segment. It wraps the Values object and does not create copies of it.

Parameters:
control - The control header as a Values object

IDOCControl

public IDOCControl()
Deprecated. As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the webMethods IDoc Java API.

Constructs a new IDOCControl object.

getField

public java.lang.String getField(java.lang.String fieldName)
Deprecated. As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the webMethods IDoc Java API.

Returns the value of the requested control header field. If this is not found, null is returned.

Parameters:
fieldName - The field which shall be returned.

Sets the value of the specified control header field.

setValues

public void setValues(com.wm.util.Values control)
Deprecated. As of SAP Adapter version 7.1, replaced by the webMethods IDoc Java API.

Parameters:
